DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this exploratory study is to evaluate the subjective measures of congestion and sleep quality in subjects who suffer from chronic nasal congestion and report trouble with their sleep.
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Subjective Sleep Study of a Prototype Nasal Dilator
DOC.criteria: Subjects with leptorrhine noses Subjects suffering from chronic nocturnal nasal congestion and report trouble with sleep
